## TextureFetchOptions type

Options for texture fetching.

Controls how a texture is loaded, converted, and optionally uploaded into an existing texture object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type TextureFetchOptions<T extends BaseTexture> = {
    mimeType?: string;
    linearColorSpace?: boolean;
    texture?: T;
    samplerOptions?: SamplerOptions;
};
```
**References:** [BaseTexture](doc/markdown/./device.basetexture.md)<!-- -->, [SamplerOptions](doc/markdown/./device.sampleroptions.md)
